mapper.insert: insert ignore into tb_cr_user_score_log(user_id, username, major_id, resource_id, event_type, delta, create_by, create_time, del_flag) values(#{userId}, #{username}, #{majorId}, #{resourceId}, 'APPROVE', #{delta}, #{operator}, #{now}, '0')

insert ignore into tb_cr_user_score_log(user_id, username, major_id, resource_id, event_type, delta, create_by, create_time, del_flag) values(#{userId}, #{username}, #{majorId}, #{resourceId}, 'BEST', #{delta}, #{operator}, #{now}, '0')
